main event: On February 9, 1955, Marion L. Townsend and his wife observed three bright lights in the sky in Fort Wayne, Indiana.
interesting points: The lights appeared to hover before one took off at tremendous speed and made a sharp turn,The lights were estimated to be at an altitude of 10,000 to 15,000 feet,The lights were round, bright white, and not blinking,The sighting lasted approximately 15 to 20 minutes,The witness described the moving light's acceleration as instantaneous.
sighted object: three bright lights in the sky
witness description: Marion L. Townsend and his wife
